attributes.comment:
Due to the extremely long wait times for adopting a child from China (along with
other countries) which is currently at 18-19 months, not only are we going to
have to be paying twice, but if you raise the fees, it will be imposing an
already expensive venture for absolutely NO reason. We have already passed our
fingerprints and have already been cleared by the government. I don't
understand the reasoning behind imposing these short expiration dates. It should
be UNLAWFUL! Please think about those of us who have been through so much
already. I hope that you will reconsider. Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Anonymous
